questions: how do i login to the app?
what do i need to enter to login?
i can't login, what should i do?
answer:
1. Open the app on your mobile device.
2. You will see the Login screen first.
3. If you already registered, enter your mobile number and password.
4. Click the Login button.
5. You will go to the Dashboard.
6. If you haven't registered yet, click on Register/Sign In button at the bottom.

questions: how do i create a new account?
i'm a new user, how do i register?
what details do i need to register?
answer:
1. Open the app on your mobile device.
2. On the Login screen, look at the bottom for Register/Sign In option.
3. Click on Register/Sign In.
4. The registration screen will open.
5. Fill in all required details (name, mobile number, password).
6. Click the Register button.
7. Your account will be created.
8. Now you can login with your credentials.

questions: i registered and logged in but can't proceed, why?
why am i not able to access the app?
account created but nothing works, what's wrong?
answer:
If you registered and logged in but cannot proceed, you need to be authorized by the admin.

Admin needs to:
1. Open Drawer menu.
2. Go to User Setting.
3. Click on User Authorization.
4. Search for your username.
5. Authorize your account.

After authorization, you can access the app features.

questions: i'm authorized but dashboard is blank, why?
why can i only see app version and profile?
how do i get feature access?
dashboard shows nothing after authorization, why?
no features are visible, what's the issue?
answer:
If you're authorized but dashboard is blank (showing only app version and user profile), you don't have rights assigned yet.

Admin needs to:
1. Open Drawer menu.
2. Go to User Setting.
3. Click on User Rights.
4. Search for your username.
5. Enable the rights by ticking checkboxes for features you need.

Only enabled features will be visible in your app.

1. Login to the app.
2. You'll be on the Dashboard.
3. Look at the top right corner.
4. Click on the Profile Icon.
5. User Profile screen will open.

questions: how do i change my password?
how can i update my password?
i want to change password, how?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Go to Dashboard.
3. Click Profile Icon at top right.
4. Click Reset Password.
5. Enter New Password.
6. Re-enter in Confirm Password field.
7. Click Reset Password button.
8. Password updated successfully.

questions: how to check for app updates?
how can i update the app?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Go to Dashboard.
3. Click Profile Icon at top right.
4. Click Check for Updates.
5. You'll be redirected to Play Store.
6. If update available, click Update.
7. Wait for download and install.

1. Login to the app.
2. Go to Dashboard.
3. Click Profile Icon at top right.
4. Click Logout.
5. You'll be logged out and taken to Login screen.

questions: where can i see my version?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Go to Dashboard.
3. Click Profile Icon at top right.
4. Scroll to bottom of screen.
5. App version number will be displayed at bottom.

questions: what is the three line icon?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. You'll be on Dashboard.
3. Look at top left corner.
4. Click Drawer Icon (three horizontal lines).
5. Sidebar menu opens showing all options.

questions: how to go back to dashboard?
how to return to main screen?
answer:
1. Click Drawer icon (three lines) at top left.
2. In sidebar menu, click Dashboard.
3. You'll be redirected to Dashboard screen.

1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer (three line icon at top left).
3. Click Masters (second option).
4. Click Party Master.
5. Party Master list screen opens showing all existing parties.
6. Each card shows party details.
7. Click any card to see more details.
8. Each card has Edit and Delete icons.

2. Click Party Master.
3. Click Add New button.
4. Add Party screen opens.
5. Fill in all required party details.
6. Click Submit button.
7. New party added to Party Master list.

questions: where is edit option for parties?
answer:

2. Click Party Master.
3. Find the party you want to edit.
4. Click Edit button on that party card.
5. Party details open in edit mode.
6. Change the data you want to update.
7. Click Update button.
8. Party details updated successfully.

3. Find party to delete.
4. Click Delete button on that card.
5. Confirmation message appears.
6. Click Yes or Confirm.
7. Party deleted from list.

questions: how to view opening stock entries?
how to see opening stock records?
where is opening stock entry screen?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click Entry (third option).
4. Click Opening Stock Entry.
5. Opening Stock list screen opens showing all entries.
6. Each card has Edit icon.
7. Click card to see full details.

questions: how to create opening stock entry?
where to add opening stock details?
how to create opening stock record?
answer:
1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click Opening Stock Entry.
3. Click Add New button.
4. Add Opening Stock screen opens.
5. Select date and godown.
6. Click Add Item button.
7. Select item, enter qty and rate.
8. Click Add button.
9. Item added to list below.
10. Click Save button at bottom.
11. Opening stock entry created.

questions: how to update opening stock details?
how to modify opening stock entry?
how to change opening stock info?
where is edit for opening stock?
answer:
1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click Opening Stock Entry.
3. Find entry to edit.
4. Click Edit button on card.
5. Full details open.
6. You'll see item card(s) below with qty, rate, amount.
7. Each item card has Edit and Delete icons.
8. Click Edit on item card to update.
9. Change qty, rate as needed.
10. Click Update to save changes.

questions: how to delete opening stock item?
how to remove item from opening stock?
how to delete opening stock entry?
where is delete for opening stock?
answer:
1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click Opening Stock Entry.
3. Click Edit on the opening stock card.
4. Item cards appear below.
5. Click Delete icon on item card you want to remove.
6. Item removed from opening stock.
Note: You cannot delete entire opening stock from list, only items within it.

1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click Entry.
4. Click Indent Entry.
5. Indent list screen opens showing all indents.
6. Click any card to see details.

1. Go to Indent Entry screen.
2. At top you'll see filter chips.
3. Click All to view all indent entries.
4. Click Pending to view only pending indents.
5. Click Authorized to view only authorized indents.
6. Click Closed to view only closed indents.
7. List updates based on selected filter.

1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click Indent Entry.
3. Click Add New button.
4. Add Indent screen opens.
5. Select date and godown.
6. Click Add Item button.
7. Enter request date, select item, enter qty.
8. Click Add button.
9. Item card appears below with eye icon, edit icon, delete icon.
10. Eye icon shows site wise stock.
11. Edit to change qty if needed.
12. Delete to remove item.
13. Click Save button at bottom.
14. Indent entry created and added to list.

questions: how to check stock while creating indent?
how to see site wise stock in indent?
where is eye icon in indent?
how to check stock before indenting?
answer:
1. When adding indent items, each item card has an eye icon.
2. Click eye icon on item card.
3. Site wise stock will be displayed.
4. You can see how much stock is available at each site.
5. This helps you decide indent quantity.

questions: where is authorize button for indent?
answer:
1. Indent list shows Authorize button on pending indents.
2. This button appears only if admin gave you Indent Authorize Access rights.
3. Click on indent card to see items and quantities.
4. Eye icon shows site wise stock for reference.
5. Click Authorize button.
6. If you want to authorize different qty (like 4 instead of 8):
   - Click Authorize button
   - Popup opens with current qty in edit mode
   - Change qty (e.g., from 8 to 4)
   - Click Authorize
7. If you want to authorize full qty:
   - Just click Authorize directly.
8. Indent is now authorized.

questions: how to close indent without authorizing?
can i close indent without approval?
answer:
1. Open indent entry list.
2. Find the pending indent card.
3. At bottom of card, there's an "i" info button.
4. Text says "Tap here to close this indent without authorization".
5. Click on it.
6. Indent will be closed without authorization.

questions: where is pdf icon for indent?
how to download indent as pdf?
answer:
1. Go to Indent Entry screen.
2. Each indent card has PDF icon.
3. Click PDF icon on the indent you want to view.
4. Indent details open in PDF format.
5. You can view, download, or share the PDF.

1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click Entry.
4. Click Purchase Order Entry.
5. Purchase Order list opens showing all orders.
6. At top, filter chips show: All, Pending, Partial, Complete.
7. Each card shows party name, godown, site, total amount.
8. Each card has PDF and Delete icons.
9. Click card to see order items with qty and amount.

1. Go to Purchase Order Entry screen.
2. At top you'll see filter chips.
3. Click All to view all purchase orders.
4. Click Pending to view only pending orders.
5. Click Partial to view partially completed orders.
6. Click Complete to view fully completed orders.
7. List updates based on selected filter.

questions: how to enter new purchase order?
answer:
1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click Purchase Order Entry.
3. Click New Order button.
4. New Purchase Order screen opens.
5. Fill date, godown, party, remark.
6. Click Add Item button.
7. List of authorized indents appears.
8. Each card has eye icon (site stock) and rupee icon (last purchase).
9. Long press on indent card to select it.
   (Long press selects the order for authorization)
   (You can select single card or click "All Select" at top to select multiple cards)
10. Click Save button.
11. Selected orders are added to purchase order.
12. Each card shows eye icon and delete icon.
13. Click Submit at bottom.
14. Purchase order created.

questions: how to see last purchase in po?
where is rupee icon in purchase order?
how to check previous purchase price?
how to view last purchase details?
answer:
1. When adding items to purchase order, each indent card has rupee icon.
2. Click rupee icon.
3. Last purchase order details for that item will be shown.
4. This helps you reference previous pricing.

questions: where is delete for purchase order?
answer:
1. Go to Purchase Order Entry screen.
2. Each card has Delete button.
3. Click Delete on the PO you want to remove.
4. Confirm deletion.
5. Purchase order deleted from list.

questions: where is pdf icon for purchase order?
how to download po as pdf?

answer:
1. Go to Purchase Order Entry screen.
2. Each PO card has PDF icon.
3. Click PDF icon on the order.
4. Purchase order opens in PDF format.
5. You can view, download, or share the PDF.

1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.

3. Click Add New button.
4. Add GRN screen opens.
5. Select date, party, godown.
6. Click Add Item button.
7. Purchase order list appears.
8. Long press on PO card to select it.
9. Data becomes editable.

questions: how to add direct grn without purchase order?
how to make grn without po?
answer:
1. Open Drawer, go to Entry.
2. Click GRN Entry.
3. At top right corner, click on 3 dot menu icon.
4. Click on Direct GRN option.
5. Add GRN screen opens.
6. Select date.
7. Select party.
8. Select godown.
9. Enter remark if needed.
10. Click Add button.
11. Add New Item screen opens.
12. Select item.
13. Enter qty.
14. Enter rate.
15. Click Add button.
16. Item card appears in Add GRN screen with edit and delete options.
17. If you want to edit item, click edit icon.
18. If you want to delete item, click delete icon.
19. Click Save button at bottom.
20. Direct GRN entry created and added to GRN list.
21. This entry will show "Direct GRN" tag in the list.

1. Go to GRN Entry screen.

questions: how to generate opening stock report?
how to view opening stock report?
how to create opening stock report?
how to get opening stock pdf?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click Reports (fourth option).
4. Click Opening Stock Report.
5. Opening Stock Report screen opens.
6. Fill filters: from date, to date, select site, select godown, select items.
   (After selecting site, only godowns of that site will be shown)
7. Click Generate Report button.
8. Report displays as PDF.
9. You can view, download, or share the PDF.
screenshots: assets/screenshot/reports/open stock report/4.1 open stock reports.jpg

8. Report displays as PDF.
9. You can view, download, or share the PDF.
screenshots: assets/screenshot/reports/site transfer report/4.5 site transfer report.jpg

questions: How to open item details from search results?
How to check item stock site-wise?
Where can I view the latest GRN for an item?
What actions are available in the search result card?
How to view complete item information after searching?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click Item Helps (sixth option).
4. Item Help screen opens.
5. Fill in date field.
6. Click Search Item button.
7. Search results display showing matching item details.
8. You can view item information from results.
9. In the search result card, click the View Details button.
10. Item Details screen opens and displays complete item information.
11. In the same card, click the View Stocks button.
12. Site-wise stock screen opens and shows available stock for the item at different locations/sites.
13. Click the Last GRN button on the card.
14. Latest GRN (Goods Receipt Note) cards open and display the most recent GRN details related to that item.

questions: how to see who needs authorization?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click User Setting (seventh option).
4. Click User Authorization.
5. User Authorization screen opens.
6. List shows all unauthorized users.
7. Search for specific user if needed.
8. Authorize users from this screen.

1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click User Setting.
4. Click User Management.
5. User Management screen opens.
6. List shows all users allocated.
7. Each user shows their role (Admin or User).
8. You can manage roles and permissions here.

questions: how to see what access users have?
answer:
1. Login to the app.
2. Open Drawer.
3. Click User Setting.
4. Click User Rights.
5. User Rights screen opens.
6. List shows all users.
7. Search for specific user.
8. You can see and modify their assigned rights.
9. Enable/disable features by ticking checkboxes.
10. Only enabled features will be visible to that user.

Available rights to assign:
- App access
- Indent Authorize access
- PO Authorize access
- Dashboard
- Masters (Party, Site, Godown, Department, Category, Item Group, Item Sub Group, Item)
- Entry (Opening Stock, Indent, Purchase Order, GRN, Site Transfer, Repair, DLR)
- Reports (Opening Stock, Indent, Purchase Order, GRN, Site Transfer, Issue Repair)
- Stock Reports (Stock Ledger, Group Stock, Site Stock, Stock Statement, FIFO/LIFO/LP Valuation)
- Item Help
- User Setting (User Authorization, User Management, User Rights)
